ui.title: Pacific And Regional Archive for Digital Sources in Endangered Cultures

splash.text: Oni acknowledges all Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Traditional Custodians of Country and recognises their continuing connection to land, sea, culture and community. We pay our respects to Elders past and present.

help.citationText: CITE AS: Oni Platform. A project with co-investment from Australian Research Data Commons, The University of Queensland, The University of Melbourne, The University of Sydney, Monash University, First Languages Australia and AARNet.
help.aboutText: This is an Oni Data Portal publication. This portal provides access to a repository of language data, it is provided by the Language Data Commons of Australia [LDaCA](https://ldaca.edu.au).

terms.text:
Effective date:  7th of June, 2023

By viewing, browsing, and using this webpage, you agree to the following Terms of Use.

Terms of Use

  1. 1. LDaCA is an online resource that enhances the findability, accessibility and reusability of language data. LDaCA does not own the data made available through the platform. Copyright for each collection of data is managed by the relevant Data Steward. Licenses cannot be sublicensed, transferred or assigned to others, unless otherwise permitted by the relevant Data Steward.
  2. 2. LDaCA users must adhere to the conditions defined in the data access licence and must conform to ethical standards with regards to sensitive data and confidentiality. When collection data is accessed for research purposes, LDaCA users must adhere to ethical research standards and processes as defined by the Australian Code for the Responsible of Research and/or by their institution. LDaCA is not responsible for breaches of data license terms.
  3. 3. Use of the collection data accessed via LDaCA must not cause disrespect, damage, or harm of any kind.
  4. 4. Material must be properly attributed using the provided citation.
  5. 5. Metadata publicly available in the LDaCA catalogue is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license.
  6. 6. LDaCA facilitates access to the collection data ‘as is’ and provides no guarantee with regards to the accuracy, completeness, or legality of the material. LDaCA users access the collection data at their own discretion and risk.
  7. 7. LDaCA users must not share their account with others. LDaCA may change the site and collection data without notice. LDaCA may suspend or cancel user access without notice.

privacy.title: Privacy

help.text: See this help page for more detail.

aggregations.name: root
aggregations.help: A group of related objects such as a corpus, a sub-corpus, or items collected in a session with consultants.

aggregations.name: countries
aggregations.help: The countries associated with the entity.

aggregations.name: licenseName
aggregations.help: The access conditions associated with a resource.

aggregations.name: type
aggregations.help: The type of object a record describes, i.e. a collection, object or file. For individual files, this field also gives information about the nature of the material, i.e. primary material, transcription, annotation etc.

aggregations.name: languages
aggregations.help: The language(s) of the content in this resource.

aggregations.name: communicationMode
aggregations.help: The mode(s) (spoken, written, signed, etc.) used in the interaction represented by this resource.

aggregations.name: linguisticGenre
aggregations.help: The linguistic classification of the genre of this resource.

aggregations.name: encodingFormat
aggregations.help: The media type of the resource.
